briefTitle: A Primary Care Behavioral Approach for Addressing Childhood Overweight

outcomeMeasures.title: BMI Z-score(for Gender and Age)at 6-months
outcomeMeasures.description: The body mass index (BMI) for a given age (in years and monthys) and gender (male or female) converted to an exact z-score.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Eating Behaviors (Consumption of WHOA Foods), Physical Activity, and "Screen Time"
BMI Z-score(for Gender and Age)at 12-months
outcomeMeasures.description: The body mass index (BMI) for a given age (in years and monthys) and gender (male or female) converted to an exact z-score.
